ygData.subject: Re: Change of plans
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t mean to be stuck up on details here, but this is a rule violation. There s a rule against mobile bases, and if you rebuild BA s base into a submarine,

I don't mean to be stuck up on details here, but this is a rule 
violation. There's a rule against mobile bases, and if you rebuild 
BA's base into a submarine, it would definetly be a mobile base.

I have no problem with a shuttle modified for water transport, and 
upgraded a bit, but a full fledged base turned into a submarine would 
be similar to me launching the Iron Fist at the Pred base for an 
attack.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     "Underwater. We construct a submarine. One powerful enough to 
take on the 
> Iron fist, deploy troops, and hold together." He said finally, and 
then 
> relaxed.
>     Tarantulas began to nod, as if he were coming up with the blue 
prints in 
> his insane little mind. Standing up he reached a display board and 
brought 
> online the blueprints to Black Aracnia's ship. 
>     "We could use this as out....um...foundation as to say. We 
would 
> deffinetly need a few modifications, and more firepower. But it 
could be 
> done." He then chuckled and tunred to face the others.
